title: Ep63: Royal Norfolk Regiment - Pre-War & Mobilisation
itunes:title: Ep63: Royal Norfolk Regiment - Pre-War & Mobilisation
itunes:subtitle: In the first episode of their new series following the Royal Norfolk Regiment in the Second World War, Peter and Gary discuss the unit as storm clouds gather across Europe in 1939. Presenters: Peter Hart and Gary Bain Publisher: Mat McLachlan...
description:
In the first episode of their new series following the Royal Norfolk Regiment in the Second World War, Peter and Gary discuss the unit as storm clouds gather across Europe in 1939.

Presenters: Peter Hart and Gary Bain Publisher: Mat McLachlan Producer: Jess Stebnicki

For more great history content, visit www.LivingHistoryTV.com, or subscribe to our YouTube channel at www.youtube.com/c/LivingHistoryTV

Pete & Gary's Military History is a Living History production.

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/pete-and-garys-military-history.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
